020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableMap;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.characterLiteralWithoutSingleQuotes;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.createDebugOutput;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.hash;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidArgument;
031
032import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
033import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
034import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Map;
039
040import org.apiguardian.api.API;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.CodeBlock;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.JavaComposer;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.JavaUtils;
050
051/**
052 *  The implementation of
053 *  {@link AnnotationSpec}
054 *  for a generated annotation on a declaration.
055 *
056 *  @author Square,Inc.
057 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
058 *  @version $Id: AnnotationSpecImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $
059 *  @since 0.0.5
060 *
061 *  @UMLGraph.link
062 */
063@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AnnotationSpecImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $" )
064@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
065public final class AnnotationSpecImpl implements AnnotationSpec
066{
067        /*---------------*\
068    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
069        \*---------------*/
070    /**
071     *  The implementation of
072     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec.Builder}
073     *  for a builder of an
074     *  {@link AnnotationSpecImpl}
075     *  instance.
076     *
077     *  @author Square,Inc.
078     *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
079     *  @version $Id: AnnotationSpecImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $
080     *  @since 0.0.5
081     *
082     *  @UMLGraph.link
083     */
084    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AnnotationSpecImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $" )
085    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
086    public static final class BuilderImpl implements AnnotationSpec.Builder
087    {
088            /*------------*\
089        ====** Attributes **===================================================
090            \*------------*/
091        /**
092         *  The building blocks.
093         */
094        private final Map<String,List<CodeBlockImpl>> m_CodeBlocks = new LinkedHashMap<>();
095
096        /**
097         *  The reference to the factory.
098         */
099        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
100        private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
101
102        /**
103         *  A flag that indicates whether the inline representation is forced
104         *  for this annotation.
105         *
106         *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec.Builder#forceInline(boolean)
107         */
108        private boolean m_ForceInline = false;
109
110        /**
111         *  The name of the annotation type to build.
112         */
113        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
114        private final TypeNameImpl m_Type;
115
116            /*--------------*\
117        ====** Constructors **=================================================
118            \*--------------*/
119        /**
120         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
121         *
122         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
123         *      builder instance.
124         *  @param  type    The name of the annotation type to build.
125         */
126        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
127        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final TypeName type )
128        {
129            m_Composer = requireNonNullArgument( composer, "composer" );
130            m_Type = (TypeNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" );
131        }   //  BuilderImpl()
132
133            /*---------*\
134        ====** Methods **======================================================
135            \*---------*/
136        /**
137         *  {@inheritDoc}
138         */
139        @Override
140        public final BuilderImpl addMember( final CharSequence name, final String format, final Object... args )
141        {
142            final var codeBlock = ((CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder())
143                .addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args )
144                .build();
145            final var retValue = addMember( name, codeBlock );
146
147            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
148            return retValue;
149        }   //  addMember()
150
151        /**
152         *  {@inheritDoc}
153         *
154         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
155         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
156         */
157        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal"} )
158        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
159        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
160        @Override
161        public final BuilderImpl addMember( final CharSequence name, final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
162        {
163            final var retValue = addMember( name, CodeBlockImpl.of( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args ) );
164
165            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
166            return retValue;
167        }   //  addMember()
168
169        /**
170         *  {@inheritDoc}
171         */
172        @Override
173        public final BuilderImpl addMember( final CharSequence name, final CodeBlock codeBlock )
174        {
175            final var validatedName = requireValidArgument( name, "name", JavaUtils::isValidName, $ -> "not a valid name: %s".formatted( name ) )
176                .toString()
177                .intern();
178            requireNonNullArgument( codeBlock, "codeBlock" );
179            final var values = m_CodeBlocks.computeIfAbsent( validatedName, key -> new ArrayList<>() );
180            values.add( createDebugOutput( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
181                .map( output -> ((CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder())
182                    .addWithoutDebugInfo( output.asComment() )
183                    .addWithoutDebugInfo( codeBlock )
184                    .build() )
185                .orElse( (CodeBlockImpl) codeBlock ) );
186
187            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
188            return this;
189        }   //  addMember()
190
191        /**
192         *  Delegates to
193         *  {@link #addMember(CharSequence,String,Object...)},
194         *  with parameter {@code format} depending on the given {@code value}
195         *  object. Falls back to {@code "$L"} literal format if the class of
196         *  the given {@code value} object is not supported.
197         *
198         *  @param  name    The name for the new member.
199         *  @param  value   The value for the new member.
200         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
201         */
202        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UnusedReturnValue", "IfStatementWithTooManyBranches", "ChainOfInstanceofChecks"} )
203        public final BuilderImpl addMemberForValue( final String name, final Object value )
204        {
205            requireValidArgument( name, "name", JavaUtils::isValidName, $ -> "not a valid name: %s".formatted( name ) );
206            if( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) instanceof Class<?> )
207            {
208                addMember( name, "$T.class", value );
209            }
210            else if( value instanceof final Enum<?> enumValue )
211            {
212                addMember( name, "$T.$L", value.getClass(), enumValue.name() );
213            }
214            else if( value instanceof String )
215            {
216                addMember( name, "$S", value );
217            }
218            else if( value instanceof Float )
219            {
220                addMember( name, "$Lf", value );
221            }
222            else if( value instanceof final Character charValue )
223            {
224                addMember( name, "'$L'", characterLiteralWithoutSingleQuotes( charValue.charValue() ) );
225            }
226            else
227            {
228                addMember( name, "$L", value );
229            }
230
231            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
232            return this;
233        }   //  addMemberForValue()
234
235        /**
236         *  Creates the {@code AnnotationSpec} instance from the added members.
237         *
238         *  @return The built instance.
239         */
240        @Override
241        public final AnnotationSpecImpl build() { return new AnnotationSpecImpl( this ); }
242
243        /**
244         *  {@inheritDoc}
245         */
246        @Override
247        public final BuilderImpl forceInline( final boolean flag )
248        {
249            m_ForceInline = flag;
250
251            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
252            return this;
253        }   //  forceInline()
254
255        /**
256         *  Returns the flag that indicates whether this annotation is
257         *  presented inline or multiline.
258         *
259         *  @return {@code true} for the inline presentation, {@code false} for
260         *      multi-line.
261         */
262        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion"} )
263        public final boolean forceInline() { return m_ForceInline; }
264
265        /**
266         *  Returns the
267         *  {@link JavaComposer}
268         *  factory.
269         *
270         *  @return The reference to the factory.
271         */
272        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface"} )
273        public final JavaComposer getFactory() { return m_Composer; }
274
275        /**
276         *  Returns the members.
277         *
278         *  @return The members.
279         */
280        @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
281        public final Map<String,List<CodeBlockImpl>> members()
282        {
283            final Map<String,List<CodeBlockImpl>> members = new LinkedHashMap<>();
284            m_CodeBlocks.forEach( (key,value) -> members.put( key, List.copyOf( value ) ) );
285            final var retValue = unmodifiableMap( members );
286
287            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
288            return retValue;
289        }   //  members()
290
291        /**
292         *  Returns the type of the annotation.
293         *
294         *  @return The type.
295         */
296        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface"} )
297        public final TypeNameImpl type() { return m_Type; }
298    }
299    //  class BuilderImpl
300
301        /*------------*\
302    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
303        \*------------*/
304    /**
305     *  Lazily initialised return value of
306     *  {@link #toString()}
307     *  for this annotation.
308     */
309    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;
310
311    /**
312     *  The reference to the factory.
313     */
314    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
315    private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
316
317    /**
318     *  A flag that indicates whether the inline representation is forced for
319     *  this annotation.
320     *
321     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec.Builder#forceInline(boolean)
322     */
323    private final boolean m_ForceInline;
324
325    /**
326     *  The code blocks that define this annotation.
327     */
328    private final Map<String,List<CodeBlockImpl>> m_Members;
329
330    /**
331     *  The name of this annotation.
332     */
333    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
334    private final TypeNameImpl m_Type;
335
336        /*--------------*\
337    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
338        \*--------------*/
339    /**
340     *  Creates a new {@code AnnotationSpecImpl} instance.
341     *
342     *  @param  builder The builder for this instance.
343     */
344    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
345    public AnnotationSpecImpl( final BuilderImpl builder )
346    {
347        m_Composer = builder.getFactory();
348        m_Type = builder.type();
349        m_Members = builder.members();
350        m_ForceInline = builder.forceInline();
351
352        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initializeCachedString );
353    }   //  AnnotationSpecImpl()
354
355        /*---------*\
356    ====** Methods **==========================================================
357        \*---------*/
358    /**
359     *  Creates a builder for an instance of {@code AnnotationSpecImpl} from
360     *  the given
361     *  {@link ClassName}
362     *  instance.
363     *
364     *  @param  type    The class name.
365     *  @return The new builder.
366     *
367     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
368     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
369     */
370    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
371    public static final BuilderImpl builder( final ClassName type )
372    {
373        return new BuilderImpl( new JavaComposer(), requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) );
374    }   //  builder()
375
376    /**
377     *  Creates a builder for an instance of {@code AnnotationSpecImpl} from the
378     *  given
379     *  {@link Class}
380     *  instance.
381     *
382     *  @param  type    The class.
383     *  @return The new builder.
384     *
385     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
386     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
387     */
388    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
389    public static final BuilderImpl builder( final Class<?> type )
390    {
391        return builder( ClassName.from( type ) );
392    }   //  builder()
393
394    /**
395     *  Emits this annotation to the given code writer.
396     *
397     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
398     *  @param  inline  {@code true} if the annotation should be placed on the
399     *      same line as the annotated element, {@code false} otherwise.
400     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
401     *      output target.
402     */
403    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
404    public final void emit( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final boolean inline ) throws UncheckedIOException
405    {
406        final var layout = requireNonNullArgument( codeWriter, "codeWriter" ).layout();
407        switch( layout )
408        {
409            case LAYOUT_FOUNDATION -> emit4Foundation( codeWriter, inline );
410            case LAYOUT_JAVAPOET -> emit4JavaPoet( codeWriter, inline );
411            //case LAYOUT_DEFAULT ->
412            default -> emit4JavaPoet( codeWriter, inline );
413        }
414    }   //  emit()
415
416    /**
417     *  Emits this annotation to the given code writer.
418     *
419     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
420     *  @param  inline  {@code true} if the annotation should be placed on the
421     *      same line as the annotated element, {@code false} otherwise.
422     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
423     *      output target.
424     */
425    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
426    private final void emit4Foundation( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final boolean inline ) throws UncheckedIOException
427    {
428        requireNonNullArgument( codeWriter, "codeWriter" );
429
430        final var whitespace = inline || m_ForceInline ? " " : "\n";
431        final var memberSeparator = inline || m_ForceInline ? ", " : ",\n";
432
433        if( m_Members.isEmpty() )
434        {
435            //---* @Singleton *------------------------------------------------
436            codeWriter.emit( "@$T", m_Type );
437        }
438        else if( m_Members.size() == 1 && m_Members.containsKey( "value" ) )
439        {
440            //---* @Named("foo") *---------------------------------------------
441            codeWriter.emit( "@$T( ", m_Type );
442            emitAnnotationValues( codeWriter, whitespace, memberSeparator, m_Members.get( "value" ) );
443            codeWriter.emit( " )" );
444        }
445        else
446        {
447            /*
448             * Inline:
449             * @Column( name = "updated_at", nullable = false )
450             *
451             * Not inline:
452             * @Column(
453             *     name = "updated_at",
454             *     nullable = false
455             * )
456             */
457            codeWriter.emit( "@$T(" + whitespace, m_Type );
458            codeWriter.indent( 1 );
459            for( final var iterator = m_Members.entrySet().iterator(); iterator.hasNext(); )
460            {
461                final var entry = iterator.next();
462                codeWriter.emit( "$L = ", entry.getKey() );
463                emitAnnotationValues( codeWriter, whitespace, memberSeparator, entry.getValue() );
464                if( iterator.hasNext() ) codeWriter.emit( memberSeparator );
465            }
466            codeWriter.unindent( 1 );
467            codeWriter.emit( whitespace + ")" );
468        }
469    }   //  emit4Foundation()
470
471    /**
472     *  Emits this annotation to the given code writer using the original
473     *  JavaPoet layout.
474     *
475     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
476     *  @param  inline  {@code true} if the annotation should be placed on the
477     *      same line as the annotated element, {@code false} otherwise.
478     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
479     *      output target.
480     */
481    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
482    private final void emit4JavaPoet( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final boolean inline ) throws UncheckedIOException
483    {
484        requireNonNullArgument( codeWriter, "codeWriter" );
485
486        final var whitespace = inline || m_ForceInline ? EMPTY_STRING : "\n";
487        final var memberSeparator = inline || m_ForceInline ? ", " : ",\n";
488
489        if( m_Members.isEmpty() )
490        {
491            //---* @Singleton *------------------------------------------------
492            codeWriter.emit( "@$T", m_Type );
493        }
494        else if( m_Members.size() == 1 && m_Members.containsKey( "value" ) )
495        {
496            //---* @Named("foo") *---------------------------------------------
497            codeWriter.emit( "@$T(", m_Type );
498            emitAnnotationValues( codeWriter, whitespace, memberSeparator, m_Members.get( "value" ) );
499            codeWriter.emit( ")" );
500        }
501        else
502        {
503            /*
504             * Inline:
505             * @Column(name = "updated_at", nullable = false)
506             *
507             * Not inline:
508             * @Column(
509             *     name = "updated_at",
510             *     nullable = false
511             * )
512             */
513            codeWriter.emit( "@$T(" + whitespace, m_Type );
514            codeWriter.indent( 2 );
515            for( final var iterator = m_Members.entrySet().iterator(); iterator.hasNext(); )
516            {
517                final var entry = iterator.next();
518                codeWriter.emit( "$L = ", entry.getKey() );
519                emitAnnotationValues( codeWriter, whitespace, memberSeparator, entry.getValue() );
520                if( iterator.hasNext() ) codeWriter.emit( memberSeparator );
521            }
522            codeWriter.unindent( 2 );
523            codeWriter.emit( whitespace + ")" );
524        }
525    }   //  emit4JavaPoet()
526
527    /**
528     *  Emits the values of this annotation to the given code writer.
529     *
530     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
531     *  @param  whitespace  The whitespace to emit.
532     *  @param  memberSeparator The separator for the members.
533     *  @param  values  The members to emit.
534     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
535     *      output target.
536     */
537    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
538    private static final void emitAnnotationValues( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String whitespace, final String memberSeparator, final List<CodeBlockImpl> values ) throws UncheckedIOException
539    {
540        if( values.size() == 1 )
541        {
542            codeWriter.indent( 2 );
543            codeWriter.emit( values.get( 0 ) );
544            codeWriter.unindent( 2 );
545        }
546        else
547        {
548            codeWriter.emit( "{" + whitespace );
549            codeWriter.indent( 2 );
550            var first = true;
551            for( final var codeBlock : values )
552            {
553                if( !first ) codeWriter.emit( memberSeparator );
554                codeWriter.emit( codeBlock );
555                first = false;
556            }
557            codeWriter.unindent( 2 );
558            codeWriter.emit( whitespace + "}" );
559        }
560    }   //  emitAnnotationValues()
561
562    /**
563     *  {@inheritDoc}
564     */
565    @Override
566    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
567    {
568        var retValue = this == o;
569        if( !retValue && (o instanceof final AnnotationSpecImpl other) )
570        {
571            retValue = m_Composer.equals( other.m_Composer ) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
572        }
573
574        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
575        return retValue;
576    }   //  equals()
577
578    /**
579     *  Creates an instance of {@code AnnotationSpec} from the given
580     *  {@link Annotation}
581     *  instance.
582     *
583     *  @param  annotation  The annotation.
584     *  @return The new instance of {@code AnnotationSpec}.
585     *
586     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
587     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
588     */
589    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
590    public static final AnnotationSpecImpl get( final Annotation annotation ) { return get( annotation, false ); }
591
592    /**
593     *  Creates an instance of {@code AnnotationSpec} from the given
594     *  {@link Annotation}
595     *  instance.
596     *
597     *  @param  annotation  The annotation.
598     *  @param  includeDefaultValues    {@code true} to include the
599     *      annotation's default values, {@code false} to ignore them.
600     *  @return The new instance of {@code AnnotationSpec}.
601     *
602     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
603     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
604     */
605    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
606    public static final AnnotationSpecImpl get( final Annotation annotation, final boolean includeDefaultValues )
607    {
608        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
609        final var retValue = (AnnotationSpecImpl) composer.createAnnotation( annotation, includeDefaultValues );
610
611        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
612        return retValue;
613    }   //  get()
614
615    /**
616     *  Creates an instance of {@code AnnotationSpec} from the given
617     *  {@link AnnotationMirror}
618     *  instance.
619     *
620     *  @param  annotation  The annotation mirror.
621     *  @return The new instance of {@code AnnotationSpec}.
622     *
623     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
624     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
625     */
626    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
627    public static final AnnotationSpecImpl get( final AnnotationMirror annotation )
628    {
629        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
630        final var retValue = (AnnotationSpecImpl) composer.createAnnotation( annotation  );
631
632        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
633        return retValue;
634    }   //  get()
635
636    /**
637     *  Returns the
638     *  {@link JavaComposer}
639     *  factory.
640     *
641     *  @return The reference to the factory.
642     */
643    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface"} )
644    public final JavaComposer getFactory() { return m_Composer; }
645
646    /**
647     *  {@inheritDoc}
648     */
649    @Override
650    public final int hashCode() { return hash( m_Composer, toString() ); }
651
652    /**
653     *  The initializer for
654     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
655     *
656     *  @return The return value for
657     *      {@link #toString()}.
658     */
659    private final String initializeCachedString()
660    {
661        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
662        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( m_Composer, resultBuilder );
663        try
664        {
665            codeWriter.emit( "$L", this );
666        }
667        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
668        {
669            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
670        }
671        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
672
673        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
674        return retValue;
675    }   //  initializeCachedString()
676
677    /**
678     *  Creates a new builder that is initialised with the components of this
679     *  annotation.
680     *
681     *  @return The new builder.
682     */
683    @SuppressWarnings( "AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject" )
684    @Override
685    public final Builder toBuilder()
686    {
687        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( m_Composer, m_Type );
688        for( final var entry : m_Members.entrySet() )
689        {
690            retValue.m_CodeBlocks.put( entry.getKey(), new ArrayList<>( entry.getValue() ) );
691        }
692
693        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
694        return retValue;
695    }   //  toBuilder()
696
697    /**
698     *  {@inheritDoc}
699     */
700    @Override
701    public final String toString() { return m_CachedString.get(); }
702}
703//  class AnnotationSpecImpl
704
705/*
706 *  End of File
707 */
